name: Nameless Waiting Game
description:
Fun little game created as an input to the amazing community of 0N1FORCE7777 NFT Project. Maybe it will make the waiting for your name to be chosen a little less boring :).

I can't paint or write pretty poems but I hope you will like this one :).



DISCLAIMER:
I do not own any of the Artwork used in the game. Everything is a property of 0N1FORCE7777 project team.
